Name: Straight Ahead
About the game: **CURRENTLY WINDOWS ONLY** An average rage deathrun type of game, with a twist. The name is literal: you can only go straight ahead. No turning back; no going sideways; and to rub extra salt in the wound, no checkpoints. 11 deathrun-like, rage-inducing precision based levels; Minimalistic but appealing level design and graphics; Another cool game to your extensive Steam catalogue that you might revisit once in a while. **BASIC TROUBLESHOOTING** Please uninstall and reinstall tbe game if you are facing a bug at the end of Level 4. Sorry. In general, if there’s any issues that return an error along tbe lines of “missing executable”, please uninstall and reinstall the game. Sorry, and thank you.
